This facility is currently closed. Details
A portion of John F. Murray Playground is currently under construction. The playground and field areas continue to be accessible while this project is underway. This renovation includes new lawns, tiered seating, a performance area, a new source water for the dog run, additional trees and plantings, and new fencing.
